chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
The Wi-Fi and Bluetooth no longer work, the phone restarts every 2-5 minutes, so it turns on and off, and sometimes the touch screen doesn't respond without any reason.
Unfortunately, I added a crack to the display on the same day, and I don't expect the repair for that to be covered.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist außerhalb der Garantie.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We confirmed the receipt of the device, however after inspecting, we found that the phone was cracked at the screen. As per the Back Market quality charter, we are unable to make a repair or exchange the product which is our warranty, and hence non compliant. Kindly check with the customer if the address below is correct: 

Uriel Vinograd
Hobrechtsfelder Dorfstrasse 24
16341 Panketal
Germany
0176 31639898

Thank you.

Regards,
CH
